channel.title: Advent of Code on Kaitlin Maciejewski
channel.description: Recent content in Advent of Code on Kaitlin Maciejewski

item.description: Advent-of-Code-2021 About my method to read in descriptions and data for Advent of Code 2021 (Using R) You will need: library(rvest) library(httr) 1. Read the description for part 1, where N is the day number `r read_html("https://adventofcode.com/2021/day/N") %>% html_element(".day-desc") %>% paste(collapse = '\n') ` 2. To load data file, you need your cookie information Login with OAuth, then find your cookie information. (Ex: inspect element > network > input (may need to refresh) > scroll to cookies)
